review: didnt work with my JVC the sound wouldn't come through. it was an older flat screen
author: petra

review: not happy. dont buy it. quality is always come as low to buffer fast. always looses connection from wifi. and if your using youtube it takes long time to lower the volume and  you have to keep the phone on all the time to stay connected on to you tube. not a good buy.
author: melvin. c. mammen

review: Not too bad, but you will need to supplemental software to stream a full line of video file types.  There are better alternatives like the Western Digital TV Live for a few pesos more.
author: Peter "pkuchnicki"

review: Service was great. Product only works when within inches of router. It only casts a few apps! No pictures,  no videos etc.DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!Vendor is great though.
author: Thomas L. Hart

review: Pretty cool device, especially for the price.
author: Mark

review: Occasional app errors prove that while this cost-effective technology has its shortcomings, when it works it works exceptionally well. Audio and video are crystal clear, HD comes through perfectly, and the convenience of working through your phone becomes second nature.An experiment that carries its weight.
author: Nichtus "S. Post"

review: Didn't work.  Kept freezing up all the time.
author: John Paul Krotulski
